View Senior External Auditor KPMG September 2006  –  October 2009  (3 years 2 months) Venezuela KPMG firms are some of the world’s leading providers of audit, tax and advisory services. We have more than 135,000 people operating in over 140 countries. 
With over 47 years of experience, Alcaraz Cabrera Vazquez is a member firm of KPMG International provides audit, tax and consulting firm with offices in six major cities: Caracas, Valencia, Maracaibo, Puerto La Cruz, Puerto Ordaz and Barquisimeto. This breadth allows us to have a variety of resources and techniques to provide our clients, both national and international quality services. Also, we have over 400 trained professionals, including 44 partners who have experience, integrity and a deep knowledge of the industry. 
Financial Auditor – External Audit Services  
•	To prescribed standards, conducting fieldwork (compliance and substantive testing, liaison with specialists, completing check lists/documentation, etc), particularly for the more complex and high risk accounts or areas of accounts. 
•	Execution of analytical reviews of balance sheet and profit and loss, including review of financial indicators. 
•	Evaluation and resolutions of significant errors identified in the execution of fieldwork. 
•	As directed, carrying out first stage review work (in-line formal review of the working papers of junior staff engaged on fieldwork for designated audits/areas of audit). 
•	Preparing audit plans; making recommendations on audit approach, methodology, materiality, risk, use of specialists, etc. 
•	Assessing staffing requirements; scheduling staff resources against timetables; preparing time budgets.  
•	Carry out special investigations into allegation of fraud, waste, and abuse, also personal matters at the request of management.  
•	Provide training to new auditors.  
•	Submitting to line managers completed audit work, preparing printers proofs for audited accounts.

Summary Tammy Philcox has a well versed background in healthcare specializing in Medicaid from working in the home health private sector and the fiscal intermediary realm involving claims processing knowledge, provider enrollment functions and processes, and Medicaid Banking operations; then transitioning into state government where she built upon that foundation through the single state agency for Florida Medicaid and the Florida Office of the Attorney General in the field of healthcare fraud detection through data analytics and criminal investigations. Tammy is a former Medicaid Fraud Analyst and Senior Investigator for the Office of the Attorney General, where she served as a Data Mining Analyst, coordinated data mining projects statewide between the Medicaid Fraud Control Unit (MFCU) and the Agency for Health Care Administrations’ Bureau of Medicaid Program Integrity. Tammy served as the subject matter expert for data detection and analytics for MFCU Head Quarters, as well as conducted criminal investigations pertaining to patient abuse, neglect, exploitation, and fraud. Tammy has 22 combined years of experience involving Home Health Care and Management, Medicaid, Provider Enrollment, Banking Operations and Audits, Data Analysis and Analytics, Fraud Detection, and Criminal Investigations. She currently serves as the Data Innovations and Analytics Manager for Pondera Solutions. Summary In my career, I made effort to understand which role I would love to take, and in which I create a value. Performance marketing was the right path to follow in digital marketing. I have also been amused by the growing trends of digital marketing and programmatic buying. Ad technology and the data platforms are pushing media buying norms to a further step every day in marketing strategies. Working in a very innovative industry is a real motivation. 
 
I joined highly motivated and skilled iProspect team to scale my experience and knowledge with top notch global and local brands. I was also offered secondary title during my current role as Client Services Manager in Amnet. I was very thrilled to have this offer along with my previous role. Currently, I am focused on both performance marketing and real time bidding technologies in iProspect & AMNET Trading Desk. 
 
For me working for a team that I admire is very rewarding. I really believe the importance of cooperation of people with the aim of building a great company. Because innovation and ambition that come from the people you work with, in the right company culture, add value to personal improvement.

Experience Chief Executive AWE agency November 2005  – Present (9 years 9 months) Levallois-Perret Créée en 2001, AWE est une agence conseil en stratégie digitale.  
 
Historiquement agence de performance marketing spécialiste de Google, l’entreprise couvre 3 domaines d’expertise : le search marketing (SEO, PPC, display, remarketing, mobile), le contenu et l’analytics (mesure et analyse de la performance digitale).  
 
Depuis 2011, AWE a développé une expérience unique dans le domaine du marketing B2B, à travers la mise en œuvre de stratégies de content marketing. Nos solutions répondent aux 2 principales problématiques des acteurs de l’industrie : acquisition de prospects et influence digitale.  
 
Société de conseil et de technologie, AWE développe sa propre plate-forme de monitoring et de reporting à destination de ses clients. L’entreprise est soutenue par OSEO depuis 2010 et son programme de recherche et développement a reçu l’agrément du ministère de la recherche et de l’enseignement supérieur.  
 
L’agence compte parmi ses clients :  
 
Retail et Ecommerce : Castorama, Banque PSA, Matelsom, AMV…  
 
B2B : Legrand, Algeco, St Gobain, GRDF, Kone, Bouygues…  
 
Réseau européen Search Everywhere :  
 
En 2009, AWE fonde le réseau d’agences européennes Search Everywhere, en partenariat avec la première agence de search marketing néerlandaise : Maxlead. A ce jour, le réseau compte une dizaine d’agences partenaires, toutes indépendantes et certifiées par Google.  
Objectif : opérer des campagnes européennes avec un haut niveau d’expertise locale.  
Références : Pierre et Vacances, TomTom, Philips…  
 
Les certifications AWE :  
 
Google Partners  
Google Adwords  
Google Analytics  
Marketing Experiments (méthodologie de testing)  
Botify Partner (analyse de crawl Google)  
 
Oseo  
Ministère de la recherche et de l’enseignement supérieur  
Bourse de commerce de Paris et Institut du mentorat.
